channel.title: Welcome! on CPSC Learning Lessons
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome! on CPSC Learning Lessons

item.title: Basic Navigation
item.description: There are three main navigation tools on this site. The Navbar on the left (click the three bars if on mobile to see) The Table of Contents on the right The Previous and Next page footer The Navbar The Navbar is the the main way to select a specific topic.
